documents.document: Nothing short of paradise Our family of 11, incl. my wife I, our adult kids , their 3 toddlers, just spent a week at PPC.Nothing but rave reviews! Excellent accommodations, spectacular grounds, great facilities, friendly and very accommodating staff, good, and plentiful food... really, just overall a great resort!Chosen an basis ot trip advisor reviews, and was definitely not disappointed!Would be happy to answer any questions.
